item.title: Blogging mit Hugo and Notion

item.title: Golang Resources
item.description: 10 Minutes introduction into Golang Channel a nice story 5 minute presentation and subsequent discussion about anonymous and promoted fields in Go. https://go.dev/play/p/7OD9nHf-2dv Introduction to Air https://github.com/cosmtrek/air Impact of References https://github.com/pixeldrama/go-heap-performance A cool summary of the Book 100 Go Mistakes and How to Avoid Them: https://100go.co/ Learn GO With Tests Bookmark Write Your own Redis/ Docker / Http Server / Any (This is an affiliate Link) Bookmark
